quoteText: If you stop using the Web Site or your permission to use the Web Site is terminated, hypster.com may continue to use and disclose your personal information in accordance with this Policy as amended from time to time. However, if you want hypster.com to stop sending you unsolicited email and other information, or you do not wish hypster.com to disclose your personal information to BaronsMedia.com LLC, trading partners or in business transactions, please notify hypster.com at info@baronsmedia.com.
title: You cannot delete your account

tosdr.case: You cannot delete your account of this service
tosdr.tldr: It is impossible to delete your account from this service, according to the AccountKiller blacklist.
